topic: Techniques for continuous self-reflection in the solar energy sector
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that adopting a mindset of playful curiosity will lead me to explore new and potentially insightful questions about my life. As a next step, I will set aside time each week to engage in a playful questioning exercise, where I allow myself to ask any and all questions that come to mind, without judgment. This will help me uncover areas of my life that might be overlooked or stagnant, fostering continuous personal growth and self-discovery.

metadata.trigger: What's a question I haven't asked myself in a while?
